duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct supervision and oversight of MRI and CT technical staff.
Participation in MRI Safety Committee and education of departmental staff on MRI Safety.
Performs HR activities, evaluations, disciplinary actions, and technical staffing schedules and vacation approvals.
Quality control of clinical images to ensure technical standards compliance.
Maintain and schedule the maintenance of imaging and patient care equipment including regulatory compliance, safety, and specifications of equipment.
ACR Accreditation of all MRI and CT units and compliance with JCAHO standards for multiple locations.
Function as site leader for off-site locations as needed and participation in Performance Improvement initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 5 years imaging experience required. ARRT (R) required, (MRI) preferred. Associates degree required. Bachelor’s degree preferred.
